words.source: H559 (אמר), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms). KJV 'And Moses said', ESV 'Then Moses said', NASB 'Then Moses said'.
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Moses'.
H413 (אֶל), HR (preposition). KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HTd/Ncmpa (article/noun-common-mp-absolute). KJV 'God', ESV 'God', NASB 'God'.
H2009 (הִנֵּה), HTm (interjection/presentative). KJV 'Behold', ESV 'If', NASB 'Behold'.
H595 (אָנֹכִי), HPp1cs (personal-pronoun-1cs). KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'.
H935 (בוא), HVqrmsa (Qal-participle-ms-absolute). KJV 'come', ESV 'come', NASB 'come'. All agree.
H413 (אֶל), HR (preposition). KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'.
H1121 (בֵּן), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'children of', ESV 'people of', NASB 'sons of'.
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Israel'.
H559 (אמר), HC/Vqq1cs (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-1cs, prophetic/future use). KJV 'and shall say', ESV 'and I say', NASB 'and I say'.
Preposition lamed + suffix 3mp. KJV 'unto them', ESV 'to them', NASB 'to them'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'The God of', ESV 'The God of', NASB 'The God of'.
H1 (אָב), HNcmpc/Sp2mp (noun-common-mp-construct/suffix-2mp). KJV 'your fathers', ESV 'your fathers', NASB 'your fathers'.
H7971 (שׁלח), HVqp3ms/Sp1cs (Qal-perfect-3ms/suffix-1cs). KJV 'hath sent me', ESV 'has sent me', NASB 'has sent me'.
H413 (אֶל), HR/Sp2mp (preposition/suffix-2mp). KJV 'unto you', ESV 'to you', NASB 'to you'.
H559 (אמר), HC/Vqq3cp (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-3cp, prophetic/future use). KJV 'and they shall say', ESV 'and they ask', NASB 'and they say'.
Preposition lamed + suffix 1cs. KJV 'to me', ESV 'me', NASB 'to me'.
H4100 (מָה), HTi (interrogative). KJV 'What', ESV 'What', NASB 'What'. All agree.
H8034 (שֵׁם), HNcmsc/Sp3ms (noun-common-ms-construct/suffix-3ms). KJV 'his name', ESV 'his name', NASB 'His name'.
H4100 (מָה), HTi (interrogative). KJV 'What', ESV 'what', NASB 'what'. All agree.
H559 (אמר), HVqi1cs (Qal-imperfect-1cs). KJV 'shall I say', ESV 'shall I say', NASB 'shall I say'.
H413 (אֶל), HR/Sp3mp (preposition/suffix-3mp). KJV 'unto them', ESV 'to them', NASB 'to them'.
